section.name: Reference
section.p: SCA references within an implementation represent links to services that the implementation uses that must be provided by other components in the SCA system. For a composite, references of components within the composite may be wired to references of the composite, indicating that those references must be resolved by services outside the composite.
References use bindings to describe the access methods used to invoke the services. See the section on Bindings for more details of bindings.
